titles.title: A concurrent resolution to correct errors in the enrollment of the bill H.R. 4612.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/14/1988--Introduced. Makes technical corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 4612 (Federal Employees Liability Reform and Tort Compensation Act of 1988), deleting a reference to a section of the Federal judicial code.
